page.title: 10LANDSCAPE-SHIREBROOK VALLEY
page.content: The Shirebrook Valley is an open space with housing all round. Many people walk in the valley each day or go across it to get from one place to another.At first sight it seems very unsightly with old mine workings,factories,sewage works and refuse tips all close together.However these things, as well as the natural life there, provide a lot of interest.Two new ventures are at present changing the valley. One is a new road which will speed up traffic from a new suburb of Sheffield on its way to the city centre.The road will pass right through the middle of the valley cutting through some old footpaths.The second change is a Countryside Management Project which is trying to conserve natural life and evidence of past industry.
